references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational text-to-image diffusion model that Add-it builds upon and extends to achieve training-free object insertion.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: Add-it leverages the multi-modal attention mechanism of this model for its weighted extended self-attention, a core part of its method.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a key advancement in diffusion models that provides the foundation for many of the techniques used by Add-it.

references.paper_title: Emu edit: Precise image editing via recognition and generation tasks
references.reason: Add-it is compared to this method in the paper, and this model is among the state-of-the-art methods that Add-it improves upon.

references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper provides another state-of-the-art baseline for comparison against Add-it, showcasing the improvements achieved in object insertion.
